content: cheeseburger coaster designed by plandesigncreate © 2026 plandesigncreate - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you are welcome to sell finished products with your own photos in small quantities but if you do so please give pattern credit to plandesigncreate thank you and enjoy stitches and abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet back loop front loop tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - red yellow green purple light pink golden wheat brown beige and white - yarn needle - stuffing - scissors final size - coaster diameters range from 7 5 cm to 9 cm technical notes *most pieces are worked in one piece *only the top bun involves sewing the pieces together *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or slip_stitch joins *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern bottom bun golden wheat round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts round 4 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts *work in the back loop for round 5 only round 5-6 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts *fasten_off and weave in the yarn tail inside of bottom bun beige make two round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts *fasten_off and weave in the yarn tail place the two beige circles inside the bottom bun lettuce green round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts round 4 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first followed by 2
